parameters.definition: Number of shifts for which officers are needed
Number of officers needed for shift s
Cost of assigning an officer to shift s

description: The town has different shifts for the police officers during the day. The town has a requirement for the number of police officers on duty during each shift. Each police officer works for two consecutive shifts. For each shift, there is a cost for starting a shift then. How many officers should the town assign to each shift to minimize the total cost?
